item.title: Jazz_daredevil
item.description: Introduction I was listening to Jon Benjamin’s “Well, I Should Have…” the other day and got to thinking on why I like it so much. Every time I hear it I can’t stop laughing, and not laughing because I think it’s funny, I laugh because I think it’s fun, and there’s a big difference (I think). Well, I Should Have… If you haven’t heard of this album, it’s a jazz album starred by Jon Benjamin, an American voice actor, who just so happens to be a piano player that has no clue whatsoever how to play piano.

item.title: I'm 20!
item.description: Basically what the title says, I’ve just turned 20 years old, and this is what’s on my mind. Stress runs in my family, and I am definetely guilty of worrying too much, too soon and too often about things. However, things have been looking up and I’ve found that lately I’ve gotten much better at not worrying unnecesseraly, and just having a good time even on weekdays, I hope that by the time I’m 21 I’ll have gotten even better at that.

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: This is my first rambling! These posts are meant to be informal, non-technical and low-quality short ramblings about me, my life, and what’s been on my mind lately.
